body_html: FWIW, PyTorch is explicitly labeling public symbols, and seems to mostly work out OK (yes people forget to add sometimes, but the Windows CI usually complains when this happens). Seems reasonable for Caffe2 to get on board too.
body_text: FWIW, PyTorch is explicitly labeling public symbols, and seems to mostly work out OK (yes people forget to add sometimes, but the Windows CI usually complains when this happens).  Seems reasonable for Caffe2 to get on board too.
body: FWIW, PyTorch is explicitly labeling public symbols, and seems to mostly work out OK (yes people forget to add sometimes, but the Windows CI usually complains when this happens).  Seems reasonable for Caffe2 to get on board too.
